title: Music player for the song store Tvoy Hit

header.description: Reworking the logic of the standard Tilda product catalog into a catalog of music compositions and integrating with a custom audio player.

info.client: Tvoy Hit - a song store by singer, composer, arranger, music producer - Oleg Shaumarov.

1.title: Constructor limitations
1.text: The website is built on the Tilda constructor. The standard approach for implementation will not work, so it's necessary to study what's under the hood of Tilda.

2.title: Responsiveness
2.text: In addition to the player functionality, it also needs to be adapted for different platforms/devices.

dev.title: Development
dev.1: Implemented using constant variables for code reuse in other projects.
dev.2: Each function is isolated, reducing the likelihood that changes in one function could cause unexpected issues or errors in another.
dev.3: Track data is retrieved directly from the Tilda product catalog, allowing even a regular user to edit the playlist.
dev.4: Adaptive player behavior for any devices is also implemented through code.
dev.5: Basic styles for correct player operation are also stored within the code.
